title: ViolaMarantina
author: ViolaMarantina
content: Hello,we are looking for a designer who can draw us nice graphics for our print on demand business.Gladly in the direction of comics and street style.Feel free to contact us. If we are a good fit, we are interested in a long-term business relationship.We need the files in png format.Please show us also some samples from your previous works.We are looking forward to your application.The price per design is negotiable and will of course vary depending on the effort involved.
